name: Koffee Kid: The Game [DEMO]
description:
Adventure begins with Brew.

Koffee's vacation is today, and he brought along his girlfriend, Koffette. But when his little brother William kidnaps Koffette in jealousy and puts all of Caffinopolis in peril, Koffee will need to hold the reservations and save both her and all of city!

Koffee now must adventure down to the Brewstein Castle, where Koffette is being held hostage. The Journey won't be easy! The path is filled with baddies and dangers of all kinds. Can you help Koffee go through the lands and save Caffinopolis?

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys - Move Koffee, Navigate Menus.

Z Button - Jump

X Button - Throw Beans

Spacebar - Confirm Menus

CREATOR'S NOTE:

Hello! I'm Gold Rock Inc. And I have something to say.

Ever since my failed project, Toontown: Scratched, I wanted to find something to do in my spare time that I could be proud of. So I decided to continue a long lost game featuring my old OC, Koffee Kid. This DEMO Features the first boss of Level 1, K-5000. I really hope you enjoy it as much as I did, and continue to motivate me for more to come.

Alternatively, You can play the Demo Here: Koffee Kid: The Game [DEMO] on Scratch (mit.edu)

Game Made on Scratch: Scratch - Imagine, Program, Share (mit.edu)

Packaged to HTML and ZIP using Turbowrap: TurboWarp Packager - Convert Scratch projects to HTML, EXE, and more
